description: Finds rows in a datatable that match a numeric comparison using teh `>`, `>=`, `<` or `<=` operators.

input.name: column
input.description: The name of column in the datatable to be filtered.

input.name: check
input.description: A number to be used for the comparison operation.

output.name: data
output.description: A new datatable with the rows that match the numerical comparison; otherwise, an empty datatable is returned.

output.name: complementary
output.description: A new datatable with the rows that do not match the numerical comparison.
